title: project ashe weird q particles

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: ok so im pretty upset, but may just be looking at this the wrong way, the ashes q particles (link above) is really weird looking, having a blue square around the little arrows, anyone else thinks this looks unfinished? or am i just looking at it weird because other people i know are saying that it supposed to be like that, please just give me some feedback cause i want someone elses insight and im wondering if this will ever be changed, i mean i spent 15$ on this skin shouldnt i get my moneys worth?

replies.body:
Hey Bubuuls! 

Thanks for the report! 

In this case, the square glow is working as intended. When played at normal speed, it creates a slick glow effect. I agree that when you slow it down, it does look a bit funky, but it's not meant to be seen in as a screenshot. :)
ok thank you for the feedback!
Think that's a bug. Those didn't happen for me
if it's a bug then riot should find out how to fix it, it's not just me ive checked multiple different videos about it and the weird rectangles are always around it, skinspotlight, brofresco etc.
im gonna see if its just the PROJECT: skin that looks like that or if its made like that in all ashe skins
K so it only looks like that if you have a lot of attack speed for ashe and your Q is active

well the problem is that its on the q particle, attack speed doesnt affect it and ive checked multiple youtube videos after its release and paused on the particle and it looks the same it does in the screenshot.
